TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AnonymousIdentificationSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class AnonymousIdentificationSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 为未验证身份的用户配置匿名标识。

span.span: Configures anonymous identification for users that are not authenticated.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类允许以编程方式访问和修改 `anonymousIdentification` 配置文件的元素。The class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `anonymousIdentification` element of a configuration file. 匿名身份验证的目的是在计算机和应用程序级别为未通过身份验证的用户分配唯一的标识。The purpose of anonymous identification is to assign, at machine and application level, a unique identity to a non-authenticated user. 然后，可以使用该唯一标识跟踪用户。This unique identity can then be used to track the user. 此上下文中使用的匿名标识与 Web 请求的颁发者的标识或与用户相关的其他安全方面没有任何关系;它只是为跟踪目的和用户状态管理分配唯一标识。Anonymous identification as used in this context does not have any relationship with the identity of the issuer of the Web request or with other security aspects related to the user; it simply assigns a unique identity for tracking purposes and user state management. 通常使用标识符跟踪匿名用户 `Session` 。Anonymous users are often tracked using the `Session` identifier. 此方法的主要问题是标识符的不唯一和存储数据以设置状态值所涉及的开销 `Session` ，必须执行此操作才能向用户分配会话标识符。The main problems with this approach are the non-uniqueness of the identifier and the overhead involved in storing data to set a `Session` state value, which must be done in order to assign a session identifier to a user. 匿名标识通过为每个未经过身份验证的用户提供唯一标识符，而不要求用户存储任何数据来设置标识符，从而解决了这些问题。Anonymous identification resolves these problems by providing a unique identifier for each non-authenticated user and not requiring the user to store any data to set the identifier. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 从基础配置文件中获取该对象。The following example shows how to obtain the object from the underlying configuration file. 使用此对象可获取或设置相关的配置值。You use this object to get or set the related configuration values. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 您可以 使用方法获取类的实例 。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::HttpCookieMode Cookieless { System::Web::HttpCookieMode get(); void set(System::Web::HttpCookieMode value); };
member this.Cookieless : System.Web.HttpCookieMode with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否使用 Cookie 的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use cookies.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性定义何时应使用 cookie 来维护有关用户的信息。The property defines when a cookie should be used to maintain information about the user. 当 属性设置为时 ，用户的标识符存储在一个 cookie 中。When the property is set to , the user's identifier is stored in a cookie. 有关详细信息，请参阅。For more information, refer to . > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 在 URI 路径内存储用户的匿名标识符 (也就是说，如果 将属性设置为以下值之一，则在无 cookie 模式下运行) ： ; 当浏览器配置文件指示不支持 cookie 时，或 当自动检测过程确定浏览器不支持 cookie 时。ASP.NET stores the user's anonymous identifier within the URI path (that is, it runs in cookieless mode) if the property is set to one of the following values: ; when the browser profile indicates that cookies are not supported; or when the auto-detection process determines that the browser does not support cookies. 最后，如果 URI 的大小和匿名标识符超过允许的长度，则不应用匿名标识符。Finally, if the size of the URI and the anonymous identifier exceeds the allowed length, the anonymous identifier is not applied. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example demonstrates how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#3)]

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie name.
The name of the cookie.
The default value is ".ASPXANONYMOUS".

member this.CookiePath : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 Cookie 的存储路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path where the cookie is stored.

value.span: 用于用户匿名标识的 HTTP Cookie 的路径。

span.span: The path of the HTTP cookie to use for the user's anonymous identification.

value.span: 默认值为斜杠 (/)，表示 Web 应用程序的根路径。

span.span: The default value is a slash (/), which represents the Web application root.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指示身份验证 cookie 的驻留位置，并与身份验证 cookie 本身一起传输。The property indicates where the authentication cookie resides and is transmitted along with the authentication cookie itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Web::Security::CookieProtection CookieProtection { System::Web::Security::CookieProtection get(); void set(System::Web::Security::CookieProtection value); };
member this.CookieProtection : System.Web.Security.CookieProtection with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用于加密 Cookie 的加密类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the encryption type used to encrypt the cookie.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要改善对 cookie 的保护，可能还需要将属性设置 为 `true` 。To improve the protection of your cookie, you may want also set the property to `true`. 如果希望数据验证和加密来帮助保护 cookie，请确保使用此属性的默认值。Be sure to use the default value for this property if you want both data validation and encryption to help protect the cookie. 此选项使用已配置的数据验证算法（基于元素）。This option uses the configured data-validation algorithm, based on the element. 如果三重 DES (3DES) 可用并且密钥足够长（48 字节或更长），则使用 3DES 来进行加密。Triple-DES (3DES) is used for encryption, if available and if the key is long enough (48 bytes or more). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieRequireSSL { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieRequireSSL : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示传输身份验证信息时是否需要安全套接字层 (SSL) 连接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) connection is required when transmitting authentication information.

value.span: 如果需要 SSL 连接，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if an SSL connection is required; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为 `true` ，则兼容的浏览器不会返回 cookie，除非通过 SSL 连接。If is `true`, a compliant browser does not return the cookie unless the connection is over SSL. > [!NOTE] > 如果匿名标识符存储在 URI 路径中，而不是 cookie 中，则该 设置不会影响匿名标识模块的行为。When the anonymous identifier is stored within the URI path, rather than in a cookie, the setting does not affect the behavior of the anonymous identification module. 这与 forms 身份验证中的行为一致。This is consistent with the behavior in forms authentication. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#7)]

span.span: ASP.NET Authentication

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CookieSlidingExpiration { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.CookieSlidingExpiration : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置每次请求时是否重置 Cookie 超时值。

span.span: Gets or sets whether the cookie time-out value is reset on each request.

value.span: 如果启用可调过期，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the sliding expiration is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 设置为时 `true` ，对于在单个会话期间发出的每个请求，cookie 有效的时间间隔将被重置为属性中指定的时间量 。When is set to `true`, for each request issued during a single session the time interval during which the cookie is valid is reset to the amount of time specified in the property. 当 设置为时 `false` ，cookie 将在设定的时间点过期。When is set to `false`, the cookie expires at a set point in time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan CookieTimeout { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.CookieTimeout : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置时间量（以分钟为单位），经过该时间间隔后身份验证便会过期。

span.span: Gets or sets the amount of time, in minutes, after which the authentication expires.

value.span: 时间量（以分钟为单位），经过该时间间隔后身份验证便会过期。

span.span: The amount of time, in minutes, after which the authentication expires.
The default value is 100000.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以设置为任意大的值，但在内部， 该值限制为最大值（两年）。This property can be set to an arbitrarily large value, but internally the value is limited to a maximum value of two years. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Domain { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Domain : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 Cookie 域。

span.span: Gets or sets the cookie domain.
The name of the cookie domain.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许在具有公共 DNS 命名空间的域之间共享匿名标识 cookie (例如，以 "contoso.com" 结尾的所有网站 ) 。This attribute allows sharing of the anonymous identification cookie across domains that have a common DNS namespace (for example, all sites that end in "contoso.com"). 必须满足以下要求才能共享匿名标识 cookie：The following requirements must be met in order for anonymous identification cookies to be shared: - 需要共享此 cookie 的站点需要具有常见的解密和验证密钥。Sites that want to share the cookie need to have common decryption and validation keys. - 对于所有站点，其他匿名标识配置属性（如 cookie 路径和 cookie 名称）必须相同。Other anonymous identification configuration attributes such as cookie path and cookie name must be the same for all the sites. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, refer to the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/CS/AnonymousIdentificationSection.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.AnonymousIdentificationSection/VB/AnonymousIdentificationSection.vb#10)]

member this.Enabled : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指示是否启用匿名标识的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether anonymous identification is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用匿名标识，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if anonymous identification is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 设置为 `true` ，则使用 cookie 来管理用户的状态信息。If is set to `true`, a cookie is used to manage the user's state information. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何访问 属性。The following code example shows how to access the property.
